page.title: 18ELECTRICAL GADGETS/TRAINERS
page.content: WE DID A SURVEY OF THE 30 PUPILS IN OUR CLASS AND FOUND OUT THAT: 30 PUPILS HAD TELEVISIONS, 20 PUPILS HAD RADIOS, 20 PUPILS HAD VIDEO-RECORDERS, 14 HAD MICRO-COMPUTERS, 12 HAD TELEPHONES, 11 HAD MUSIC-CENTRES, 10 HAD ELECTRIC COOKERS, 6 HAD MICRO-WAVE COOKERS, 5 HAD CITIZEN BAND RADIOS (C.B.) ...................................... NEARLY EVERYONE IN OUR SCHOOL WEARS TRAINING SHOES,WE WANTED TO FIND OUT WHICH WERE THE MOST POPULAR MAKES AND HOW MUCH THEY COST. ADIDAS WAS THE MOST POPULAR, FOLLOWED BY DUNLOP,THEN NIKE AND PUMA,LEAST POPULAR WAS DONAY. MOST PEOPLE SPENT BETWEEN Â£10 AND Â£20 A PAIR,SOME SPENT Â£30 A PAIR AND SOME ONLY PAYED Â£5.
